API for user code, for example scripts that interact with the display builder.

Fundamental display model API:

  • {@link org.csstudio.display.builder.model.Widget} - Base for each widget
  • {@link org.csstudio.display.builder.model.DisplayModel} - Root of a display's widget tree

Helpers for scripts:

  • {@link org.csstudio.display.builder.runtime.script.ScriptUtil} - Other script helpers
  • {@link org.csstudio.display.builder.runtime.script.PVUtil} - Read/decode value of a PV
  • {@link org.csstudio.display.builder.runtime.script.ValueUtil} - Handle PV's values
  • {@link org.phoebus.framework.macros.MacroHandler} - Macro support
